1453323.content: How many does she try at once?
1453323.title: Four or more

choices: Girls forces Bowser to drank potions.
14533232.content:
Peach looked back to Bowser, who gave her 9 small bottles, all filled with different coloured potions. She poured all 9 of them in goblet, which was next to her. Mixture of potions had made liquid changing colour ever now and then. She picked goblet and drank it. First she started to lose balance and finally she lost her consciousness. Bowser started to laugh and watched how potion started to transform Peach.

First she started to grow yellow scales all over body. Her body started to grow as well in which her clothes started to rip. Then her face started to transform similar what Bowser has. After it, she grew small tail and shell started to form on her back. Her feet melded into one big foot with claws. Her fingers grew claws as well. Peach's breast and butt started to expand till they were size of power up mushrooms. Her butt and hips also started to get bigger and wider. Finally her transformation was complete.

Then duplication, size and personality potions started to do their job. Two identical Peach-Koopas popped out of nowhere. One started to shirk till she was almost at the same height of Peach when she was a human. Her yellow hair and shell changed into light blue. Finally Sleeping Beauty Koopa was ready. Second one started to grow till she was 1.5 times larger than Bowser himself. Her yellow hair and shell changed into dark red. Finally Horny Godzilla Koopa was ready. Original one didn't neither grow nor shrink. Her yellow hair and shell changed into purple. Finally Queen Koopa was ready.

All of them woke up and looked at Bowser.

"Master, what happened?", Purple one asked.

"You lost your consciousness. Do you remember your names?", Bowser asked.

"No", all three of them said in unison.

"Bella (blue), Rose (red) and Priscilla (purple)"

All three of them nodded.

"Now girls, you know what to do?"

"To please master however he wants!"

"Good girls"

What happens next:
14533232.title: All 9 of them

1453323221.content:
"Now girls!", Priscilla yelled.

"Huh?", Bowser said.

All three of them jumped to of Bowser with potion bottles on their hands.

"Get of me! Bad girls!", Bowser yelled.

Girls didn't listen and poured 7 potions down his throat.

"What was in those!?!", Bowser yelled before he lost his consciousness.

Just like Peach previously two Bowsers popped out of nowhere. One of them shirk to almost same height as Bella, yet little taller. His red hair and shell turned into dark blue. Finally Sleeping Handsome Koopa was ready. Second one grow larger than Rose. His red hair and shell turned into dark red. Finally Super Horny Godzilla Koopa was ready. Lastly original Bowser's hair and shell turned into purple. Finally King Koopa was ready.

All of them woke and looked at girls:

"What happened?", Purple Bowser asked.

"You lost your consciousness. Do you remember your names?" Priscilla asked.

"No", all three of them said in unison.

"King Brody Bowser Koopa (blue), King Richard Bowser Koopa (red) and King Peter Bowser Koopa (purple). 3 brothers who rule Koopa Kingdom"

All three of them nodded.

"Do you remember what were you going to do with us?"

"To make you please us however we want!"

"Good boys"

"What was that!?!"

"We meant: yes masters"

"Good"

info.brief_description: bowser x peach interactive story please add
info.description:
All right Bowser x peach fans this is your time to shine. Go and make your own bowser x peach story in this realm

Rules: only Bowser x peach with the expection of a bowserxharem (more then one princess) but start with peach
Bowser and peach can not die everyone else is kill able
if peach becomes bowsers slave or bride it does not matter
no characters from other games
no gender bending or gender switching

that is all have fun
